messages.content: Ah man I finished RDR2 twice, so decided to try out GTA V and ran into [NAME] last night! Awesome character!
Fake news! but really, that's awesome to have a parent that actually understands how to teach their child accountability.
It’s always nice to say something [nice]!
It's pretty warm in Australia during this time of year.
To be fair, I will also continue to jerk off to pictures of [NAME] in shorts He looks so good in them
That's awesome. For the record, I do get anxious over very non intrusive questions, I really have a tenancy to read too much into things.
[NAME] stopped napping at 18 months. We’ve been implementing quiet time since. It’s wondrous.
One thing I appreciate about the Prequel trilogy is that it explores the rise of fascism better than *Fantastic Beasts* movies could do.
That sounds really cool! I'll be there
GO SUB TO HIM HES THE BEST
Try really warm water instead. It's awesome.
He's not my type but [NAME] is handsome AF. /s
I was going to ask what temperatures are like where you live. The beauty of losing refrigeration in the winter is having the great outdoors.
He already has a baby with his girlfriend who’s gorgeous
How generous :) you must really make them happy. Good on you for that
Your smartly worded refutation of the whole of the rest of Christendom has swayed me completely, Rome is the only true home! Hurrah! Hurrah!

POINTER!!!!!! YOU DA REAL ALL STAR!!!

This internet stranger is also super proud of you! Way to go!!!
She was 100% more likable on the tell-all than she was in the show. She may deserve that sweet husband of hers yet!
